title: JSON schema for the reachability metadata used by GraalVM Native Image

comment.title: A comment applying to the whole file (e.g., generation date, author, etc.)

reflection.title: Metadata to ensure elements are reachable through reflection

jni.title: Metadata to ensure elements are reachable through JNI

serialization.title: Metadata for types that are serialized or deserialized at run time. The types must extend 'java.io.Serializable'.

items.title: Enables serializing and deserializing objects of the class specified by <type>

reason.title: Reason for the type's inclusion in the serialization metadata

condition.title: Condition under which the class should be registered for serialization

type.title: Type descriptor of the class that should be registered for serialization

customTargetConstructorClass.title: Fully qualified name of the class whose constructor should be used to serialize the class specified by <type>

resources.title: Metadata to ensure resources are available

reason.title: Reason for the resource's inclusion in the metadata

condition.title: Condition under which the resource should be registered for runtime access

glob.title: Resource name or pattern matching multiple resources (accepts * and ** wildcards)

bundles.title: Metadata to ensure resource bundles are available

items.title: Resource bundle that should be available

reason.title: Reason for the resource bundle's inclusion in the metadata

condition.title: Condition under which the resource bundle should be registered for runtime access

locales.title: List of locales that should be registered for this resource bundle

items.title: Elements that should be registered for reflection for a specified type

condition.title: Condition under which the class should be registered for reflection

type.title: Type descriptor of the class that should be registered for reflection

methods.title: List of methods that should be registered for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Method descriptor of the method that should be registered for reflection

fields.title: List of class fields that can be read or written to for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Field descriptor of the field that should be registered for reflection

allDeclaredMethods.title: Register all declared methods from the type for reflective invocation

allDeclaredFields.title: Register all declared fields from the type for reflective access

allDeclaredConstructors.title: Register all declared constructors from the type for reflective invocation

allPublicMethods.title: Register all public methods from the type for reflective invocation

allPublicFields.title: Register all public fields from the type for reflective access

allPublicConstructors.title: Register all public constructors from the type for reflective invocation

unsafeAllocated.title: Allow objects of this class to be instantiated with a call to jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe#allocateInstance or JNI's AllocObject

items.title: Elements that should be registered for JNI for a specified type

condition.title: Condition under which the class should be registered for JNI

type.title: Type descriptor of the class that should be registered for JNI

methods.title: List of methods that should be registered for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Method descriptor of the method that should be registered for JNI

fields.title: List of class fields that can be read or written to for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Field descriptor of the field that should be registered for JNI

allDeclaredMethods.title: Register all declared methods from the type for JNI access

allDeclaredFields.title: Register all declared fields from the type for JNI access

allDeclaredConstructors.title: Register all declared constructors from the type for JNI access

allPublicMethods.title: Register all public methods from the type for JNI access

allPublicFields.title: Register all public fields from the type for JNI access

allPublicConstructors.title: Register all public constructors from the type for JNI access

condition.title: Condition used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

typeReached.title: Type descriptor of a class that must be reached in order to enable the corresponding registration

type.title: Type descriptors used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

proxy.title: List of interfaces defining the proxy class

items.title: Fully qualified name of the interface defining the proxy class

method.title: Method descriptors used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

name.title: Method name that should be registered for this class

items.title: List of the method's parameter types

field.title: Field descriptors used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

name.title: Name of the field that should be registered for reflection
